Summary: slow moving object about the size of Jupiter
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my uncovered deck checking aircraft with 10x binoculars.At about 6:58pm oct 8 2012 I noticed an object about the size of Jupiter moving very slowly from my south west to my south east closer to straight up rather close to horizon.I could see no stucture.I watched it come towards me and then away.Still just 1 single light.I followed it pretty good between my house and neighbor.I took my eye off it for just a couple seconds,trying to orient myself and its gone at about 7:00pm
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Sun City West
There was one other sighting in Sun City West on or around October 8th 2012
